pull.title: doc: add release note for 29091 and 29165
pull.body: GCC 11.x or Clang 15.x are now required to compile Bitcoin Core.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/30261).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+Build
+-----
+
+GCC 11.1 or later, or Clang 15+ or later,
comments.body: nit: In the phrase "Clang 15+ or later" the plus sign seems redundant.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@

+-----

comments.body: I can fix it up in the follow-up https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30263

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+Build
+-----
+
+GCC 11.1 or later, or Clang 15+ or later,
comments.body: Yea. Will merge this now. If clang-16 happens, it can be updated, if not, it can be changed in the wiki.
